alert.note: Alert for Barnes; Cavalier; Griggs; Nelson; Ramsey; Ransom; Sargent; Western Walsh County (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 04 at 9:44PM CST until January 05 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northeast and southeast North Dakota. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Dangerously cold wind chills as low as 40 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
